channel.title: PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor
channel.description: The PHP scripting language web site

item.title: PHP 4.3.5RC1 released!
item.description: PHP 4.3.5RC1 has been released for testing. This is the first release candidate and should have a very low number of problems and/or bugs. Nevertheless, please download and test it as much as possible on real-life applications to uncover any remaining issues. List of changes can be found in the NEWS file.

item.title: PHP 5.1.1 released!
item.description: PHP 5.1.1 has been released. The third beta of PHP is also scheduled to be the last one (barring unexpected surprises). This beta incorporates dozens of bug fixes since Beta 2, better XML support and many other improvements, some of which are documented in the ChangeLog. Some of the key features of PHP 5 include: PHP 5 features the Zend Engine 2.
